title: A Day To Remember - Homesick (2008)
description:
If you like this torrent please visit!

Nothing dries more quickly than a tear! nihil-lacrima-citius-arescit.blogspot.com



A Day to Remember (commonly abbreviated to ADTR) is a five-piece post-hardcore band from Ocala, Florida, signed to Victory Records. They are often said to have influences in many genres, including pop punk,metalcore, and even death metal.The band's music has been described as "mixing death metal grunts with the brash melodies of pop-punk,"and a cross between "bouncy pop punk [and] chugging metalcore."

Homesick is A Day to Remember's third studio album. It will be released on February 2, 2009 in Europe and February 3, 2009 in the United States. It was produced by Chad Gilbert of New Found Glory. In October of 2008 a song "Wax Larry" appeared on the bands MySpace, which was the demo of "I'm Made Of Wax, Larry, What Are You Made Of?". The album leaked in its entirety on January 14th.

On January 16th, the song 'Welcome To The Family' was put up on the band's MySpace profile, free for fans to hear. On January 28th, the song 'The Downfall Of Us All' was put up on the band's MySpace profile. On January 29th the song "NJ Legion Iced Tea" was released as the first single. The second single will be "The Downfall Of Us All" also a video has been shot for it.

So far, 3 online episodes have been produced, showing the recording of Homesick, however is shown in mockumentary style episodes. These episodes can be found on YouTube.


Track listing

1. "The Downfall of Us All" - 3:29
2. "My Life for Hire" - 3:33
3. "I'm Made of Wax, Larry, What are You Made of?" - 3:00
4. "NJ Legion Iced Tea" - 3:31
5. "Mr. Highway's Thinking About the End" - 4:15
6. "Have Faith in Me" - 3:08
7. "Welcome to the Family" - 3:00
8. "Homesick" - 3:56
9. "Holdin' it Down for the Underground" - 3:23
10. "You Already Know What You Are" - 1:27
11. "Another Song About the Weekend" - 3:45
12. "If It Means a Lot to You" - 4:03
